course.subject: ENVR
course.name: Environmental Laboratory
course.description: This course is an integrated laboratory course designed for students in Environmental Management and Technology. Students will relate the environmental principles and theories in practice and gain hands-on experience. Students will be trained to perform basic environmental laboratory experiments, collect and handle environmental samples, operate environmental instruments, analyze and interpretate the experimental data. For EVMT students only.

reviews.author: LSJU
reviews.title: Workload is too much
reviews.comment_content: The content is still pretty good. It covers a very wide range of topics. Learned a lot of useful knowledge.
reviews.comment_teaching: Each professor's style is not quite the same. Sometimes the TA is in charge of the instructuring.
reviews.comment_grading: I'm not sure. But since the number of students is so small, I think most of them work hard, but the grades couldn't be able to be given too well.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is too much, and even though it's only used once a week, it's four hours at a time, which is way too long! I have to write lab reports every week. it takes me about eight hours or so each to write a good lab report, it's just too much work! Not quite right as a 2 credits course. I think the workload is at the level of 4 credits.
